title: Saints Row IV
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The epic conclusion to the game that changed all the rules! The Saints have gone from the crackhouse to the White House—but the Earth has been invaded and it’s up to you to free the world from Overlord Zinyak and his alien empire. With homies new and old by your side, and an arsenal of superpowers and strange weapons, you must save the world in the wildest open world game ever!

childDownloads.title: Fleur de Leather Outfit
childDownloads.description: The Saints know how to look good whether on crime-ridden streets, in the Oval Office, or trapped in a twisted virtual world.

childDownloads.title: Fun Shaundi's Outfit
childDownloads.description: Get back to Shaundi's laid-back roots. Light bulb not included.

childDownloads.title: Hey Ash Whatcha Playin' Trailer
childDownloads.description: See the new dramatically dramatic trailer for the most over the top game of the year!

childDownloads.title: His Name is Paul
childDownloads.description: When Saints Flow gets in your system it takes on a whole new life… and it has a name.

childDownloads.title: His Name is Paul
childDownloads.description: When Saints Flow gets in your system it takes on a whole new life… and it has a name.

childDownloads.title: How The Saints Saved Christmas Trailer
childDownloads.description: See the new dramatically dramatic trailer for the most over the top game of the year!

childDownloads.title: I Heart Zinyak
childDownloads.description: Show your love for the Zin Empire and your favorite alien overlord, Zinyak.

childDownloads.title: I Heart Zinyak
childDownloads.description: Show your love for the Zin Empire and your favorite alien overlord, Zinyak.

childDownloads.title: Joe Magarac's Casting Ladle
childDownloads.description: The Joe Magarac statue in Steelport Harbor wouldn't be nearly as noteworthy without his iconic ladle.

childDownloads.title: Mind Control Helmet
childDownloads.description: THEY CAN TOTALLY READ YOUR THOUGHTS.

childDownloads.title: Mini Paul Mascot Prop
childDownloads.description: Bring the giant mascot down to size! Just don't try to drink him.

childDownloads.title: RC ASP Tank
childDownloads.description: Take control of this low-rez tank straight from Matt Miller's cybernetic prison.

childDownloads.title: Saints Flow Can Outfit
childDownloads.description: Someone has to stand on the corner and sell this stuff. May as well be you!

childDownloads.title: Saints Flow Can Outfit
childDownloads.description: Someone has to stand on the corner and sell this stuff. May as well be you!

childDownloads.title: Saints Row IV
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The epic conclusion to the game that changed all the rules! The Saints have gone from the crackhouse to the White House—but the Earth has been invaded and it’s up to you to free the world from Overlord Zinyak and his alien empire. With homies new and old by your side, and an arsenal of superpowers and strange weapons, you must save the world in the wildest open world game ever!

childDownloads.title: Online Pass
childDownloads.description: You don't have to face the world's greatest threat alone. With Online Pass, you and a running mate can take on the Zin together.

childDownloads.title: Saints Row IV - Accolade Trailer
childDownloads.description: Saints Row IV - the most over the top open world action game ever - has now arrived!

childDownloads.title: Anime Pack
childDownloads.description: Finally, the fantasy of Eastern cultural happiness can be yours! Get hair defying the elements of winds! Slice many of the people of bad with Braver Sword! Kaiju-XL makes little of foes with speed and curiosity! Also dress up clothing changes any Street of 3 Holy Man a beholding wonder!

childDownloads.title: Bling Bling Pack
childDownloads.description: We’re bringing bling back to the Row with this set of money-themed superpowers. In these hard financial times, what better way to boost the economy than to power your buff to shake down enemies, turn your foes into gold with the Midas touch, make it rain with stomp, or blast people in the face with some dollar-dollar bills, yo. Strap this on and shake that moneymaker!

childDownloads.title: BradyGames Pack
childDownloads.description: Make good use of that strategy guide with this here submachine gun!

childDownloads.title: College Daze
childDownloads.description: Go Greek with a set of fratboy and sorority girl outfits, and be the life of the party with not one but two classic college traditions: the beer helmet and a bra hat. Also includes Shayne's Barstool Racer.

childDownloads.title: Commander-in-Chief Pack
childDownloads.description: You are the Leader of the Free World—so act like it!  Defend the Great Nation with the ultimate in patriotic hardware. Blast through the skies with the Screaming Eagle jet, take out all those who hate us for our freedom with the 'Merica gun, and do it all dressed as the embodiment of the American Dream himself—Uncle Sam!

childDownloads.title: Dubstep Gun (Remix) Pack
childDownloads.description: Take a bullet-laden trip through musical history! Get the crowd off its feet with the power of polka, set those hepcats a-swinging with big band, indulge your refined side with some classical, and then start the moshpit with some heavy metal.

childDownloads.title: Saints Row IV - Dubstep Remix Pack Trailer
childDownloads.description: See the new dramatically dramatic trailer for the most over the top game of the year!

childDownloads.title: Element of Destruction Pack
childDownloads.description: Boost your super-abilities with dynamite power! Explosive Blast, Chain-Boom TK, Explosive Buff, and the Time-Bomb Stomp add a whole new level of simulation-busting mayhem to Saints Row IV.

childDownloads.title: Enter the Dominatrix
childDownloads.description: If you already own the Season Pass DO NOT purchase this here as you will be charged again. Enter the Dominatrix reveals the wild hijinx of the original vision of the canceled SR3 expansion. Steelport has been taken over by the Dominatrix and only the Saints can stop her from trapping everyone in a virtual prison! Includes behind-the-scenes commentary and the return of some fan-favorite characters.

childDownloads.title: Executive Privilege Pack
childDownloads.description: You've never let anyone else tell you what to do so why let us get away with it? The Executive Privilege Pack does away with checks and balances and gives you the power to make the world of Saints Row IV your own. Cheat your way to a hollow victory today!
